fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Choose the group that, if it were to retract its support to the regime, would most endanger the regime (i.e. most strongly increase the chance that it loses power).
fxInfo_question: Which (one) group does the current political regime rely on most strongly in order to maintain power? Do not code for years denoted as "interregnum".

fxInfo_responses.value: The aristocracy, including high status hereditary social groups and castes.
Agrarian elites, including rich peasants and large landholders.
Party elites (of the party or parties that control the executive).
Urban working classes, including labor unions.
A foreign government or colonial power.

name: v3regimpgroup
